channel.title: No Guns Glitch
channel.description:
Hey people
I found a pretty bad glitch and another quite funny glitch
Bad Glitch My guns just vanished: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m1n6QYWjstA[/url]
The Amazing Marine that can take 10000000 bullets: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oU_8Qz2utr0[/url]
Please read descriptions of the video which i add a little bit more info there

item.title: No Guns Glitch
item.dc:creator: raidicus
item.description:
I’m getting the same issue. Guns disappeared right where yours did, and the bug seems to have affected all of my saves so I can’t just reload an old save

Read full topic
